## Please make sure to check the following tasks before opening and submitting a PR

* [ ] I understand and have followed the [contribution guide](https://armabattles.com/docs/contributing)
* [ ] I have tested my changes locally and they are working as intended
* [ ] These changes do not have any notable side effects on other Arma Battles projects
* [ ] (optional) I have opened a pull request on [the translation repository](https://github.com/armabattles/translations)
* [ ] I have included screenshots to demonstrate my changes
